_header: Saint Lucy that holy maid in Sicily was I-bore
Subjects: saints’ lives; Lucy, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Lucy in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynte Lucie þat holi maide in cicile was iboreWel ȝong
                    heo gan to seruy god & bileue sunne & hore…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…þer heo is wiþ ihesu crist In Ioie wiþþouten
                    endeNou god for þe loue of hire ous lete þuder wende

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint lusie þat holy mayde In sysile was I borewel ȝong
                    ȝhe gan to serue god & lefte sinne & hore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Þere Yhe is wit Ihesu crist In ioyȝe wit outin
                    endenow Iesw for þat maydenus loue vs let þedir wende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Lucie þe holy maide in Cicile was i boreWel ȝong
                    heo bi gon to serue God and bi leuede sunne and hore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þere heo is wiþ Ihesu crist in Ioye wiþ outen
                    endeNou God for þe loue of hire vs lete alle þider wende.
                    Amen.

Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEinte lucie þat holie mayde In Cesile was i boreȜong heo
                    bigan to serui god and bi lefde sunne and hore…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þare heo is with Ihesu crist in Ioye with outen endeNou
                    god for seint lucie loue þuddre us late i wende
BodLauMis108.Note:
Double columns written as prose, f. 60v, and crowded into
                    lower margin to fit on f. 60v.
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 101-6.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEine lucie þat holy mayde in Cisile was y boreWel ȝong
                    she gan to serue god & leued synne & hore…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þere she is with Ihesu Crist in ioye withouten endeNou
                    god for þe loue of hire vs lete all þerde þider
                    wende
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne lucie þe haly maiden in Cicil borne scho wasWhil sho was
                    ȝonge sho lufed godd & sho was ful of graceDame Evtice hir modre
                    hight a hethen woman was schoA grete sekenes on hir sho had no leche myght
                    it fordo…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Þat maiden is in heuene blisse with godd withouten
                    endeNow sayne lucye make vs worthe vnto þat ioy to wende

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
SAynt lucie that holy mayde in Cecile was boreWell ȝong she
                    began to serve god to leve synne & hore…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…Ther she is with Ihesu crist in Ioie withouten endeNow god
                    for saynt lucie love thider graunte vs to wende

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Lucie þe holy mayde in sysile was yboreHoly ȝong
                    ȝeo suede god & fforsok sunne and hore…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Eke sat ȝeo stille hit greuede hure noþingAt euere
                    ȝeo prechede faste of Ihesu heuene kyng…
CamMagPep2344.Note: Ends incomplete due to lost folio(s).

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint lucie þat holy maide in Cizile heo was yboreWel
                    ȝonge heo gan serui god to leue synne & hore…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…þer heo is with ihesu crist in Ioie with þouten
                    endenow god for seint lucie loue late ous þuder wende

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEynte lucie þat holi maide in cecile was iborewel ȝong hȝe gan to serui god & bileue synne & hore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þer heo is wit ihesu crist in ioie withouten endenou god for þe loue of hir ous late alle þuþer wende
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxxix” added to lower margin by later hand (f. 214).

BLEge2810.Last Lines: …þere heo is mid ihesu crist in ioye weþoute endeNou god vor þe loue of hire ous lete alle þidir wende

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt lucie þe holy mayde in cisile was yboreWel ȝong heo bygan to seruy god & fle synne & hore…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …þer heo is myd ihesu crist in ioyȝe wiþ outen endeNou god for þe loue of here vs lete alle þider wende

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Lucy þe holy maide in Cicile was boreȝenge she gan
                    to serue god & lete synne and ore…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Wher she is wiþ Ihesu crist in Ioye wiþout endeNow
                    god for loue of þat maide. lat vs þider wende. Amen.
